'''Ogne''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

This woman's unceasing smile and direct, violating gaze give the strong impression of someone selling something. Ogne is a fanatic working for [Gaderian Bosc](/gaderianBosc/), in charge of recruiting followers to his cause.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [The Lighted Path](/theLightedPath/)
|none            = 
|other           = * She's a member of the [Partisans of the Lighted Path](/partisansOfTheLightedPath/), a sub-sect of the [Children of the  Dawnstars](/childrenOfTheDawnstars/) led by the enigmatic [Gaderian Bosc](/gaderianBosc/).
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Lighted Path](/theLightedPath/): Ogne is the source of information on where to find Bosc.
[Category:The Sacred Stair characters](/categoryTheSacredStairCharacters/)
[Category:Temple of Gaun characters](/categoryTempleOfGaunCharacters/)
